page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: Young male The first thing I do when I wake up is get dressed, then I have my breakfast which consists of cereal called Weetabix. Then at 8.30am I set of for the bus stop to get the bus for the comprehensive (Boston Spa). When I am at school the first lessons I have are Maths and English.I have school dinners.Today I had mashed potatoes, chicken pie, and rice pudding for desert. Then I have my afternoon lessons Art and Science. At 4.00pm I go home and have my tea: gammon and chips. Then I watch Top of the Pops and do my homework and go to bed at 9.00pm.
